1207460.name: Memody: Sindrel Song - Soundtrack
1207460.description:
The soundtrack for Memody: Sindrel Song, by the developer, Tobias Cornwall.

Track list:

  • Sindrel Song - Ambience
  • Life
  • Remedy's Beach
  • Remedy's Song - I'll Be Here For You
  • Hammer's Crag
  • Hammer's Song - A Challenge To Win
  • Duhrge's Cavern
  • Duhrge's Song - Death Is A Dark Calm Slumber
  • Vivace's Peninsula
  • Vivace's Song - Here To Hear This Rainbow
  • Course's Grove
  • Course's Song - 'Course I'll Flow Along My Own Course
  • Hearth's Grotto
  • Hearth's Song - Life Is Worth Living
  • Memody's Mind
  • Memody's Sindrel Song
  • Life Worth Living
  • Sindrel Lore
  • Shrine of the Aolmna
  • Sindrel Song (Unused bonus track)

20 tracks, total duration 1:26:48
